name: Custom Post Text
author: Jonathan Ellse

sections.description:
This plugin is for adding certain text to every post, before or after.

  • Example : You can add a copyright notice to each post, or licensce information

For Example and Details Visit : http://www.jjtcomputing.co.uk/

My Technical Blog is : http://www.jjtcomputing.co.uk/blog
If you have any queires / complaints regarding this plugin, please feel free to mail me at webmaster@jjtcomputing.co.uk. Thank you.

See my blog for updates http://www.jjtcomputing.co.uk/blog/ .

For general support, please consider posting on http://www.jjtforum.co.cc/, so everyone can benefit from your answer.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the files
  2. Upload custom-post-text directory (containing custom-post-text.php file) to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

OR

  1. Locate it using the Plugin browser function
  2. Click Install
  3. On the “Success!” screen, click Activate.
sections.faq:
Should i edit any files?

No, just activate the plugin.
